text: "Yes," he said. I know. "No harm must come to her, Dan." She'll be all right. It's the men who'll be after that coach I'm interested in, Johnny. I know. But if lead shooting at us to bother with the coach and the folks in it."
handwritten_text: "Yes," he said. I know. "No harm must come to her, Dan." She'll be all right. It's the men who'll be after that coach I'm interested in, Johnny. I know. But if lead shooting at us to bother with the coach and the folks in it."
